trial_identification.studytitle: Trial of BMS-986012 in Combination With Platinum and Etoposide
trial_identification.scientifictitle: A Phase 1/2 Randomized Trial of BMS-986012 in Combination With Platinum and Etoposide as First-line Therapy in Extensive-Stage Small Cell Lung Cancer

interventions.interventions:
Treatment: drugs - BMS-986012 Treatment: drugs - Cisplatin Treatment: drugs - Etoposide Treatment: drugs - Platinum Treatment: drugs - Carboplatin
Experimental: Experimental Arm 1 - BMS-986012/Cisplatin/Etoposide
Experimental: Experimental Arm 2 - BMS-986012/Carboplatin/Etoposide
Experimental: Experimental Arm 3A - BMS-986012/Platinum/Etoposide
Active Comparator: Active Comparator Arm 3B - Platinum/Etoposide
Treatment: drugs: BMS-986012
Treatment: drugs: Cisplatin
Treatment: drugs: Etoposide
Treatment: drugs: Platinum
Treatment: drugs: Carboplatin

primaryOutcome.outcome: Number of participants with adverse events (AEs)
primaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1, Day 1 up to approximately 26 months.

primaryOutcome.outcome: Number of participants with serious adverse events (SAEs )
primaryOutcome.timepoint: Date of enrollment up to approximately 26 months.
Cycle 1, Day 1 up to approximately 26 months.

primaryOutcome.outcome: Number of participants who died due to AEs
primaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1, Day 1 up to approximately 26 months.

primaryOutcome.outcome: Number of participants with laboratory toxicity grade shift from baseline
primaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1, Day 1 up to approximately 26 months.
From date of first dose or randomization until date of confirmed disease progression, up to 2 years

secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1 Day 1 up to 60 days after last dose

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Time of maximum observed serum concentration(Tmax)
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1 Day 1 up to 60 days after last dose

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from time 0 to time of last quantifiable concentration(AUC(0-T))
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1 Day 1 up to 60 days after last dose

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Observed serum concentration at the end of a dosing interval(Ctau)
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1 Day 1 up to 60 days after last dose

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Area under the concentration-time curve in 1 dosing interval(AUC(TAU))
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Cycle 1 Day 1 up to 60 days after last dose
Cycle 1 Day 1 up to 60 days after last dose

eligibility.inclusivecriteria:
For more information regarding Bristol-Myers Squibb Clinical Trial participation, please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com
- Male and Females 18 years of age or older
- Pulmonary SCLC documented by histology or cytology
- Extensive disease (Stage IV) SCLC
- Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status 0 or 1
eligibility.exclusivecriteria:
- Prior systemic therapy for lung cancer
- Symptomatic brain metastases
- Grade 2 peripheral neuropathy
- Active or chronic infection with human immunodeficiency virus (HIV), hepatitis B virus (HBV), or hepatitis C virus (HCV
- Other active malignancies or prior malignancy within 2 years
Other protocol defined inclusion/exclusion criteria could apply

ethicsAndSummary.summary: The purpose of this this study is to administer BMS-986012 in Combination with Platinum and Etoposide as First-line Therapy in Extensive Small Cell Lung Cancer.
